summary: Redone and more realistic textures for singlebelong\'s WickedBlade mod.
descriptionHtml:
Wicked Blade Revamped Textures

Drop in grunge texture pack for singlebelong\'s excellent Wicked Blade armor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27511)

Diffuse scaled up to 4kx4k, all others are the same resolution but redone. Stuck as close to the original color scheme as possible.

I used the \"shining 1\" preset for the speculars.

---

V2: uncompressed normals to eliminate blockiness (compare before & after pics) at cost of extra texture size (15 MB). Your choice.

Tools used:
Adobe Photoshop CS6
nDo2 and dDo (http://www.quixel.se/)
Perfect Photo Suite (http://www.ononesoftware.com/)

Graphics settings:
Opethfeldt6 ENB (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18941)
SweetFX
Bokeh DoF and Tilt Shift for ENBSeries (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24024)
author: jimhsu
